page.title: 19SCHOOLS
page.content: Children go to school from Monday to Friday.Our school,Lyndhurst Middle, has a headmaster, 14 teachers and 400 children(aged 8-12 years).Class size is about 30.The main building has two halls and the years are split into four parts around them: 2 years upstairs and 2 downstairs plus another hut at the back for a fourth- year class.There are 2 toilet blocks for girls and 2 for boys,one science laboratory,television room,and cookery room.There are 2 playgrounds-one for quiet games and one for rougher games, such as chase.We are taught Maths, English,Science,History,Cookery, Geography,Woodwork,Craft,Singing,Games and P.E.(Physical Education).There are after school clubs such as recorders,gymnastics,cycling and choir.
